title: Apple iPad mini 3 $150 off today only at Best 64GB Wi-Fi $350 shipped (Orig. $499)
text: As one of its Deals of the Day, Best Buy is taking $150 off various of iPad mini 3 models. With today’s discount you can get a 64GB Wi-Fi iPad mini 3 for $349.99 shipped, which is just $31 more than Apple is charging for a 32GB iPad mini 2. That slight bump is price is a […] »
